RSE Asia


Home
About
☰


RSE Asia


Welcome! This is the website of the Research Software Engineering (RSE) Asia Association. The RSE Asia Association is being built as a project under the Open Life Science program (OLS-4).




We will be launching the RSE Asia Association on Thursday, 14th October 2021. This day holds special significance as it is being celebrated as the International RSE Day, for the first time! At the launch event we will be conducting activities for contributing to Hacktoberfest 2021 too. We hope to have you join us at the launch event.




This is our official logo!

This website is built using the distill package. The source code for this website is located in the website_rse-asia GitHub repository.
We abide by the Society of Research Software Engineering code of conduct.
Follow our updates on Twitter at the handle RSE_Asia.
